system:
note description: "A keyboard accelerator defines ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_actionsactions to be performed when a../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_keykey is pressed. See {EV_TITLED_WINDOW}.accelerators" legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." keywords: "accelerator, keyboard, key, shortcut, hotkey" date: "$Date: 2017-05-03 08:56:14 -0700 (Wed, 03 May 2017) $" revision: "$Revision: 100317 $"
class ../interface/ev_accelerator.xmlEV_ACCELERATOR
inherit ../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY redefine ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_outout, ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_is_equalis_equal, ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_implementationimplementation end
FalseDEBUG_OUTPUT undefine ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_outout, ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_is_equalis_equal, ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_default_createdefault_create, ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_copycopy end
create ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_default_createdefault_create, ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_make_with_key_combinationmake_with_key_combination
feature {NONE} -- Initialization
f_make_with_key_combination../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_make_with_key_combinationmake_with_key_combination (a_key: ../interface/ev_key.xmlEV_KEY; require_control, require_alt, require_shift: FalseBOOLEAN) -- Create with a_key and modifiers. require a_key_not_void: a_key /= Void do ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_default_createdefault_create ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_set_keyset_key (a_key) if require_control then ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_enable_control_requiredenable_control_required end if require_alt then ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_enable_alt_requiredenable_alt_required end if require_shift then ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_enable_shift_requiredenable_shift_required end end
feature -- Events
f_actions../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_actionsactions: ../interface/ev_notify_action_sequence.xmlEV_NOTIFY_ACTION_SEQUENCE -- Actions to be performed when key combination is received by the window within which -- Current is parented. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_accelerator_i.xml#f_actionsactions ensure result_not_void: Result /= Void end
feature -- Access
f_parented../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_parentedparented: FalseBOOLEAN -- Does Current have a parent? -- Current is parented if it has been placed in the -- accelerator list of a window. -- key combination of Current cannot be modified if True. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_accelerator_i.xml#f_parentedparented end
f_key../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_keykey: ../interface/ev_key.xmlEV_KEY -- Key that will trigger ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_actionsactions. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_accelerator_i.xml#f_keykey ensure bridge_ok: Falseequal (Result, ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_accelerator_i.xml#f_keykey) end
f_shift_required../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_shift_requiredshift_required: FalseBOOLEAN -- Must the shift key be pressed to trigger ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_actionsactions? require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_accelerator_i.xml#f_shift_requiredshift_required ensure bridge_ok: Result = ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_accelerator_i.xml#f_shift_requiredshift_required end
f_alt_required../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_alt_requiredalt_required: FalseBOOLEAN -- Must the alt key be pressed to trigger ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_actionsactions? require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_accelerator_i.xml#f_alt_requiredalt_required ensure bridge_ok: Result = ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_accelerator_i.xml#f_alt_requiredalt_required end
f_control_required../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_control_requiredcontrol_required: FalseBOOLEAN -- Must the control key be pressed to trigger ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_actionsactions? require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_accelerator_i.xml#f_control_requiredcontrol_required ensure bridge_ok: Result = ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_accelerator_i.xml#f_control_requiredcontrol_required end
feature -- Status setting
f_set_key../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_set_keyset_key (a_key: ../interface/ev_key.xmlEV_KEY) -- Assign a_key to ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_keykey. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed a_key_not_void: a_key /= Void not_parented: not ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_parentedparented do ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_accelerator_i.xml#f_set_keyset_key (a_key) ensure a_key_assigned: ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_keykey.Falseis_equal (a_key) end
f_enable_shift_required../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_enable_shift_requiredenable_shift_required -- Make ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_shift_requiredshift_required True. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed not_parented: not ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_parentedparented do ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_accelerator_i.xml#f_enable_shift_requiredenable_shift_required ensure shift_required: ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_shift_requiredshift_required end
f_disable_shift_required../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_disable_shift_requireddisable_shift_required -- Make ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_shift_requiredshift_required False. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed not_parented: not ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_parentedparented do ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_accelerator_i.xml#f_disable_shift_requireddisable_shift_required ensure not_shift_required: not ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_shift_requiredshift_required end
f_enable_alt_required../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_enable_alt_requiredenable_alt_required -- Make ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_alt_requiredalt_required True. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed not_parented: not ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_parentedparented do ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_accelerator_i.xml#f_enable_alt_requiredenable_alt_required ensure alt_required: ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_alt_requiredalt_required end
f_disable_alt_required../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_disable_alt_requireddisable_alt_required -- Make ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_alt_requiredalt_required False. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed not_parented: not ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_parentedparented do ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_accelerator_i.xml#f_disable_alt_requireddisable_alt_required ensure not_alt_required: not ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_alt_requiredalt_required end
f_enable_control_required../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_enable_control_requiredenable_control_required -- Make ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_control_requiredcontrol_required True. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed not_parented: not ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_parentedparented do ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_accelerator_i.xml#f_enable_control_requiredenable_control_required ensure control_required: ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_control_requiredcontrol_required end
f_disable_control_required../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_disable_control_requireddisable_control_required -- Make ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_control_requiredcontrol_required False. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed not_parented: not ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_parentedparented do ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_accelerator_i.xml#f_disable_control_requireddisable_control_required ensure not_control_required: not ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_control_requiredcontrol_required end
feature -- Status report
f_is_equal../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_is_equalis_equal (other: like Current): FalseBOOLEAN -- Does other have the same key combination as Current? do Result := ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_keykey.Falseis_equal (other.../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_keykey) and then ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_alt_requiredalt_required = other.../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_alt_requiredalt_required and then ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_shift_requiredshift_required = other.../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_shift_requiredshift_required and then ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_control_requiredcontrol_required = other.../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_control_requiredcontrol_required end
f_text../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_texttext: FalseSTRING_32 -- String representation of key combination. local a_key: FalseSTRING_32 do create Result.Falsemake (0) if ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_control_requiredcontrol_required then Result.Falseappend ("Ctrl+".Falseas_string_32) end if ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_alt_requiredalt_required then Result.Falseappend ("Alt+".Falseas_string_32) end if ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_shift_requiredshift_required then Result.Falseappend ("Shift+".Falseas_string_32) end a_key := ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_keykey.../interface/ev_key.xml#f_texttext if a_key.Falsecount = 1 then a_key.Falseto_upper end Result.Falseappend (a_key) ensure then result_attached: Result /= Void end
f_out../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_outout: FalseSTRING_8 obsolete "Use `text' instead. [2017-05-31]" -- New string containing terse printable representation -- of current object do Result := ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_texttext.Falseas_string_8_conversion end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I, ../interface/ev_accelerator_list.xmlEV_ACCELERATOR_LIST} -- Implementation
f_implementation../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_implementationimplementation: ../implementation_interface/ev_accelerator_i.xmlEV_ACCELERATOR_I -- Responsible for interaction with native graphics toolkit.
feature {NONE} -- Implementation
f_create_interface_objects../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_create_interface_objectscreate_interface_objects -- Create objects to be used by Current in ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_initializeinitialize -- Implemented by descendants to create attached objects -- in order to adhere to void-safety due to the implementation bridge pattern. do end
f_create_implementation../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_create_implementationcreate_implementation -- See {EV_ANY}.create_implementation do create {../implementation_gtk/ev_accelerator_imp.xmlEV_ACCELERATOR_IMP} ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_gtk/ev_accelerator_imp.xml#f_makemake end
feature -- Status report
f_debug_output../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_debug_outputdebug_output: FalseSTRING_32 -- String that should be displayed in debugger to represent Current. do Result := ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_texttext end
invariant key_not_void: ../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_keykey /= Void

end -- class ../interface/ev_accelerator.xmlEV_ACCELERATOR
